articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Cryptoverse: What crisis? Venture capitalists bet big on crypto
articles.description: In the first half of the year, VCs bet $17.5 billion on crypto firms, according to data from PitchBook. That puts investment on course to top the record $26.9 billion raised last year.

articles.description: Earlier today, the dollar wobbled around just below multi-decade peaks on Tuesday, as traders eyed a rate hike from the US Federal Reserve and for any clues about whether hints of a slowing economy will prompt a shift away from its focus on inflation.

articles.title: गुजरात में शराब बैन फिर भी पीने का मिलता है परमिट, जानें क्या हैं नियम
